name: LudumDare42_Home
description:
You are the captain of a cargo named LD-42.

You running out of space. Your loads are Humans (alive).

Your mission, deport thems (every where you want), and go home.

Good Luck !

Mini-bug : when you choose qwerty, A key don't work just first time... So push it one time, and it work fine for the whole game !
